mapper.select: SELECT B.TITLE, B.BNO, B.WRITER, B.REGDATE, B.HIT, B.DIV, COUNT(R.BNO) REPLY_CNT FROM BOARD B LEFT OUTER JOIN REPLY R ON R.BNO = B.BNO WHERE B.BNO > 0 AND DIV = #{div} GROUP BY B.TITLE, B.BNO, B.WRITER, B.REGDATE, B.HIT, B.DIV ORDER BY B.BNO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD(BNO, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITER, DIV) VALUES(BNO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, #{div})
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET HIT = HIT + 1 WHERE BNO = #{bno}
mapper.select: SELECT B.BNO, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITER, REGDATE, UPDATEDATE, DIV, HIT, FILENAME, UUID FROM BOARD B LEFT OUTER JOIN FILES F ON B.BNO = F.BNO WHERE B.BNO = #{bno}
SELECT WRITER FROM BOARD WHERE BNO = #{bno}
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET HIT = HIT - 1 WHERE BNO = #{bno}
